description:
With Martijn Verburg, Mark Little, Antonio Conclaves, Ian Robinson, Heather VanCura, David Blevins & Peter Pilgrim

"Java EE is dead!". I've already heard that. "Java EE is delayed!" It's not the first time. "Spec leads are quiet!". Are they supposed not to be "The JCP is useless!". As Well as the W3C ?

If you are fed up of rumours about Java EE, why don't you come to this panel? You will ask your questions to the community, the JCP itself, and Java EE vendors.
title: To EE or not to EE Panel
